description: System-generated unique identifier for this schedule status change record.
Date and time the status change was logged.
Identifier of the user or process that performed the status change.
Identifier of the schedule (e.g., job, route, maintenance) whose status changed.
Snapshot key referencing the static schedule dimension captured at the time of change; confirm with SME.
Snapshot name or description of the schedule at the time of change; confirm with SME.
Code representing the resulting schedule status after the change.
Snapshot key for the resulting status in a static lookup at change time; confirm with SME.
Snapshot description for the resulting status at change time; confirm with SME.
Code representing the prior schedule status before the change.
Snapshot key for the prior status in a static lookup at change time; confirm with SME.
Snapshot description for the prior status before the change; confirm with SME.
Timestamp when this record was last updated.
Identifier of the user who last updated this record; sample suggests a timestamp, so confirm with SME.
User ID that created this record.
Timestamp when this record was created.
User ID that last modified this record.
Timestamp when this record was last modified.
